participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly, sociable, and a bit sensitive about her online presence.
participant_1.background: I am from austin , texas. I post a lot about the food i eat on social media. I like to cook new recipes. When people do not like my social media posts , it upsets me. I like every post i see on social media.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.background: I would like to go to school to become a veterinarian. I love animals and i want to help them. I love going to the gym. I have three pets. I am currently on a diet.

content.text: Hi! I'm from Austin, Texas. What about you?
I'm from California, but I'm moving to Texas next month!
Oh, that's exciting! What are you moving to Texas for?
I'm going to school to become a veterinarian!
That's great! I love animals, too. What kind of animals do you like the most?
I love all animals, but I especially love dogs and cats.
Me too! I have a dog and a cat at home.
Oh, that's so cute! What are their names?
My dog's name is Buddy and my cat's name is Mittens.
I love those names! They're so cute.
Thanks!
I'm currently on a diet to lose weight. Do you ever diet?
Yes, I do! I'm always trying to stay in shape.
Oh, good! I know how hard it can be to stay on a diet.
It can be really tough, but it's worth it to feel good about yourself.
I agree! I'm really excited to start my new life in Texas.
I'm sure you'll love it here! It's a great state.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to meeting new people and making new friends.
I'm sure you'll do great! You're so friendly and outgoing.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
I'm sure you'll make plenty of friends in Texas.
